alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 9:23PM CDT until September 24 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Smith County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Wood County in northeastern Texas... Western Upshur County in northeastern Texas... West central Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 923 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hoard, or 11 miles southeast of Mineola, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Tyler, Gladewater, Gilmer, Mineola, Lindale, Quitman, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Rosewood, Hoard, Hainesville, Liberty City, Winona, Red Springs, Carroll, Bettie, Grice, and Pritchett. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
